nodes.text: The First was the name given to an enormous yozusk that lived in the swamps and jungle south of Kaas City on the planet Dromund Kaas. During the Cold War, the First occupied a region of the Malignant Bog known as the Fen of the First until it was killed.

The First appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as the World Boss on Dromund Kaas. it is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means it was killed.
